trust.title: Trust and Results

feedbacks.title: Feedback
feedbacks.1.feedback: Ilm Hub courses took my career to the next level! The instructors are highly professional.
feedbacks.2.feedback: The courses are clear and practical. I learned backend development and started my own project.
feedbacks.3.feedback: Modern programs and a great team. I recommend Ilm Hub to everyone!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.name: Name
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact.error: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.

q1.question: How can I enroll in your courses?
q1.answer: Enrolling in our courses is very simple. Navigate to the "Courses" section on our website, choose the course that suits you, and click the "Enroll" button. Our managers will contact you shortly.

q2.question: What is the format of your classes?
q2.answer: Our classes are conducted offline in modern, well-equipped classrooms by experienced instructors. An individual approach is ensured for each student.

q3.question: Do you provide a certificate upon course completion?
q3.answer: Yes, every student who successfully completes the course will receive a certificate that meets international standards.

q4.question: What payment methods are available?
q4.answer: Payments can be made in cash, bank transfer, or through online payment systems. Installment payment options are also available.

q5.question: How is the class schedule structured?
q5.answer: The class schedule varies depending on the course. Typically, classes are held 3 times a week, each lasting 1.5-2 hours. Detailed information can be found on the chosen course page.

q6.question: Are prior knowledge/skills required?
q6.answer: Some of our courses (e.g., Foundation) do not require prior knowledge, while others may require certain basic skills. The requirements for each course are specified in its description.

q7.question: Do you offer online classes?
q7.answer: While the primary focus is on offline classes, online formats may be offered for some specialized courses or groups. Please contact us for more detailed information.

q8.question: What is the qualification of your instructors?
q8.answer: Our instructors are highly qualified specialists in their fields, possessing years of practical experience and pedagogical skills. They continuously update their knowledge.

q9.question: Do you assist graduates with employment?
q9.answer: Yes, we help our best graduates with employment by recommending them to partner companies. We also provide consultations on resume writing and improving interview skills.

footer.description: Ilm Hub is an innovative educational center for mastering future professions and achieving success in the IT field.

coursesIntro.title: Start Your IT Career With Us
coursesIntro.description: Become a highly skilled specialist through our courses, developed based on the latest technologies and practical projects. Our experienced instructors will assist you every step of the way.

aboutIntro.title: Our Story: From Knowledge to Problem Solving
aboutIntro.description: Ilm Hub was founded with the mission to equip young professionals with the profound knowledge and practical skills necessary to succeed in the digital world. Our core values include continuous learning, innovation, and teamwork.
aboutIntro.imageAlt: Ilm Hub classroom, students in class

missionSection.title: Our Mission: Cultivating Future Leaders
missionSection.description: Ilm Hub's core mission is to shape creative and innovative professionals who meet the demands of the IT industry by providing every student with modern knowledge and practical skills. We not only educate but also support our students' personal and professional growth.
missionSection.imageAlt: Ilm Hub students in class, working on computers

valuesModal.title: Our Core Values
valuesModal.value1Description: We constantly seek new technologies and pedagogical approaches, updating our educational programs to meet contemporary demands. We encourage our students to pursue continuous learning and embrace novelty.
valuesModal.value2Description: Every course we offer is built upon practical projects and real-world problems. Our goal is to reinforce students' theoretical knowledge with hands-on skills and provide them with real work experience.
valuesModal.value3Description: At Ilm Hub, we foster an environment based on mutual respect, collaboration, and support. Our team and students form a large family that supports each other.
valuesModal.value4Description: We consider each student's individual interests and abilities. We create conditions for them to fully realize their potential and guide them towards success in their future careers.

teamIntro.title: Our Team of Qualified Specialists
teamIntro.description: Every instructor at Ilm Hub is a true expert in their field, possessing deep knowledge and extensive practical experience. They are ready to share their expertise, help you overcome challenges, and find your path in the IT industry.

companiesSection.title: Companies Where Our Graduates Work
companiesSection.description: Students have the opportunity to intern at the following companies during their studies

publicOfferPage.title: PUBLIC OFFER
publicOfferPage.section1Text1: This document (hereinafter – the Offer) is a public offer of the Non-State Educational Institution "Ilm Hub" (hereinafter – the Educational Institution) for the conclusion of an agreement on the provision of educational services. The Offer is binding on any legal or natural person (hereinafter – the Customer) who has accepted it, in accordance with the requirements of Articles 367 and 369 of the Civil Code of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
publicOfferPage.section1Text2: Full and unconditional acceptance of the Offer is carried out by the Customer by making payment in accordance with the invoice issued by the Educational Institution. From the moment of payment, the terms of the Offer become binding on the Customer and the Educational Institution.
publicOfferPage.section2ListItem1: The Educational Institution undertakes to provide the Customer (or its student) with educational services in accordance with educational programs and plans.
publicOfferPage.section2ListItem2: Educational services are provided in accordance with the current license of the Educational Institution.
publicOfferPage.section2ListItem3: The name, duration, cost, and order of training courses are specified on the official website of the Educational Institution or in a separate agreement.
publicOfferPage.section2ListItem4: The Educational Institution provides services within the terms agreed upon in the contract, after payment by the Customer.
publicOfferPage.section3Title: 3. Rights and Obligations of the Parties
publicOfferPage.section3Text: Educational Institution: to provide educational services qualitatively, organize the educational process, ensure educational programs. Customer: to pay for services on time, comply with the internal regulations of the Educational Institution, ensure the student's discipline.
publicOfferPage.offerDate: This offer is valid from January 1, 2024

vacanciesPage.title: Available Vacancies
vacanciesPage.vacancy1Description: We are looking for an experienced Frontend Developer with React.js expertise to join our team. Create innovative web applications with us.
vacanciesPage.vacancy1Req1: Strong knowledge of React.js, Next.js, Redux
vacanciesPage.vacancy2Description: We are seeking a Backend Developer with experience in Node.js or Python (Django/Flask). Develop scalable and high-performance server-side applications.
vacanciesPage.vacancy3Description: Creative UI/UX designer needed to design user interfaces and experiences. Make our products intuitive and appealing to users.
vacanciesPage.vacancy3Req1: Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch
vacanciesPage.vacancy4Description: Experienced Marketing Manager to help develop and implement marketing strategies. Contribute to the growth of our brand.
vacanciesPage.vacancy4Req2: Knowledge of digital marketing tools (SEO, SMM, Google Ads)
